nodes.bodyText: Looks like a typo or incomplete thought here?
Next line below completes the sentence.  Can this be on one line instead of wrapping?

Maybe this should be phrased differently as to not have all the numbers right next to each other, likely the source of confusion.

This loader supports version 1.0.0. Support for loading versions 0.5.0 and 0.4.0 was removed...
Swapped the wording on this to make it more clear.
